ovdesc.p: System-supported table generated and maintained to list all roles a customer fulfils for other customers. This table is automatically updated by the system whenever there is an update.

desc.p: A valid CUSTOMER. Customer in Relationship Multivalue set. Every time customer X is added into the multivalue set, Record X on this table will be updated.

Links to the CUSTOMER(s) with whom this customer has a role. Each time this customer (X) is added to another customer (Y) Relation multi-value set with the role as specified in 1.X ROLE the customer linked (Y) will be added to this subvalue field.
A valid EB.ROLE. Links to the ROLEs specified for this customer on the RELATIONSHIP multi-value set.
